name: Bootstrap-adaptive-tabs
tagline: Extending Bootstrap (Pure CSS) tabs functionality to make all extra tabs available through dropdown "More tabs" if there is no room for them
body:
### Pure CSS Bootstrap Adaptive Tabs
# On small screens all tabs that don't fit the screen will be moved to a dropdown list using just CSS, no JavaScript

Label for "active" tab will be displayed under the tab list for small screens.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
